channel.title: Selling Air Battlestaves for alching, decent profit!
channel.description:
Right so, on my way to 99 crafting i make a lot of air battlestaves, and these give a decent profit when alched.
My selling price is [b]9,075gp each.[/b] The high alch value is [b]9,300gp each.[/b]
If you buy your own natures, that is [b](9,300 - 9,075) - 168 = 57gp profit.[/b]
I'd prefer to sell them in bulk of at least 500 at a time though, for time saving reasons. If interested, i sit at soul wars bank on World 117, in-game name: Spelj0han.
[b]Current Stock: 149[/b]
More will come on a regular basis.

[quote=“ultimatepkvillage, post:16, topic:440684”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=543359.msg3982851#msg3982851 date=1335490897]
Pretty sure that only applies to real world trading.
[/quote]

@Davidi2 When were we able to do that? because according to Moparisthebest you can’t sell or buy anything from the rules he put on this section.[/quote]

You can make legitimate in game trades to others, just be advised if you get scammed by another forum member the staff will not get involved.
